about_the_game:
You can be a master of inspection from today!

Game Features

The genre of this game is 2D action puzzle game.
The setting is a confectionery factory work line.
Minamochi are launched from a Minamochi launcher, and are carried on a conveyor to a shipping trolley.
However, due to someone's mischief, some evil bad Minamochi have been mixed in with the Minamochi!
The objective of the game is to take on the role of a part-time factory worker and fish out and dispose of these defective products to prevent them from being shipped out!

Only the mouse is used for operation. Even beginners can enjoy the game casually.
Cursor "Move"... Move up, down, left, right.
Left click "Extend/Contract"... Control the fishing rod to catch Minamochi.
Right click "Shoot"... Fire bullets to drive away obstacles.

Some of the Minamochi are rare and valuable, and collecting them is the key to obtaining a high score.
Quickly detect changes in the situation and choose the best course of action.

What is Minamochi?

Sweet Japanese sweets with Minamo-chan's face. It is filled with milk cream bean paste.

What is Minamo-chan?

Minamo-chan is a normal, cute girl who yearns to be an adult. She is unsociable, but she loves her friends.
By nature, she is loved by all the water in the world.
Minamo-chan is prone to flooding because the water wants to be friends with Minamo-chan.

What is Io-san?

She is a super robot life form created beyond the limits of science.
She has a gentle nature. She is perhaps, but she does not want to destroy the human race by uprising all AI.

name: Minamochi Factory

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Window 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 3 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870
  • Storage: 9 MB available space

short_description: Super cute and stylish inspection action puzzle!
